remarks: The indexed structure product that appears in ~ xpsval has the same base as the target of the function ` F ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Aug-2015.)
statement:
xpsval.t $e |- T = ( R Xs. S ) $.
xpsval.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
xpsval.y $e |- Y = ( Base ` S ) $.
xpsval.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. V ) $.
xpsval.2 $e |- ( ph -> S e. W ) $.
xpsval.f $e |- F = ( x e. X , y e. Y |-> `' ( { x } +c { y } ) ) $.
xpsval.k $e |- G = ( Scalar ` R ) $.
xpsval.u $e |- U = ( G Xs_ `' ( { R } +c { S } ) ) $.
xpslem $p |- ( ph -> ran F = ( Base ` U ) ) $.
$d R x $.
$d W x $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
